text: Tadera age nuhera sampradaya ebam tadera pare aneka dala'o mithyaropa karechila. Pratyeka um'mata nija nija rasulake pakara'o karara sankalpa karechila ebam tara asara tarke lipta hayechila, ta dbara satyake byartha kare deyara jan'ya. Phale ami taderake pakara'o karalama. Sutaram kata kathora chila amara sasti
